description.translate: Standing at the very top, nothing can reach it.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Sommet immuable\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Trônant tout en haut,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7rien ne l'atteint.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Standing at the very top,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7nothing can reach it.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7LUC§a1 §7HAS§c-2\"}"],color:2127385}}
